thread.title_full: Next college football coach to get fired: Al Golden, Mike London? - College Football - SI.com

title: Next college football coach to get fired: Al Golden, Mike London? - College Football -
text:
by SI Staff Posted: Wed Oct. 14, 2015
It’s only mid-October, but the coaching carousel is already whirling at full speed. Three head coaches were fired after Week 6 and a fourth resigned .
That has hardly resolved the hot seat watch, as several more coaches are still hanging on with little job security. Who could be the next to be fired in the wake of Dan McCarney , Randy Edsall and Steve Sarkisian ’s axings? SI.com’s college football writers weigh in. Andy Staples: Al Golden, Miami
College Football Video Steve Sarkisian saga just the latest example of USC’s mismanagement by Michael Rosenberg
